type.description: The data type of the schema property

description.description: The description of the schema property

required.description: Array of required schema properties. Used when the `properties` attribute contains nested schema

items.description: Item type and enum values for `array` type properties

type.description: Data type of the enum values

enum.description: Enum values for schema type properties

properties.description: Nested JSON schema properties that follow the same specification

meta.description: Properties that fall outside the JSON schema specification, which can be used to inform the UI about how to render the schema property as a form input

help.description: A help message that describes the schema property
help.example: This is a help message for the schema property

password.description: Indicates whether the value of the schema property should be hidden

field_type.description: Indicates the type of (input) UI that is expected to render this schema property. Used to differentiate between properties that have the same schema format

label_translations.description: Key/value pair where the key is a locale code, e.g. "en-GB", and the value is the translated `description` of the schema property

[az]{2}-[AZ]{2}.description: The translated description of the schema property

example.de-DE: The description of the schema property in German
example.fr-FR: The description of the schema property in French

enum_labels.description: Key/value pair where the key is a schema property enum value and the value is a human readable label

enum_label_translations.description: Key/value pair where the key is a schema property enum value and the value is an object with translated human readable labels

additionalProperties.description: Key/value pair where the key is a locale code, e.g. "en-GB", and the value is a translated human readable label
